style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="630" y="320" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-17" value="Recommend" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="951.5" y="282.5" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-19" value="Indexing" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="951.5" y="387.5" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-20" value="Catalog" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1058.5" y="172.5" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-21" value="Promotion" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1058.5" y="282.5" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-24" value="..." style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1058.5" y="610" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-28" value="CMS" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="180" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-30" value="aggregated data provider B" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="380" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-31" value="aggregated data provider C" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="440" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-33" value="- 모든 요청/응답은 gateway를 통한다<br>- 사용자 및 디바이스 정보를 헤더에 넣는다<br>- 요청에 따라 랜딩할 페이지를 정하고,<br>&nbsp; &nbsp;Page layout Admin에서 호출할<br>&nbsp; &nbsp;모듈 목록을 받아와 비동기 호출한다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="405" width="210" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-34" value="모든 내부 호출은 API registry에 등록된 api mapping 정보에 의해 이뤄진다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="928.5" y="85" width="210" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-35" value="- 페이지별 레이아웃을 설정한다<br>&nbsp; (모듈순서, eager/lazy loading 등)" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="180" width="210" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-36" value="- 비즈니스팀에서 정의한 <br>&nbsp; 프로모션 상품, 배너 등을 저장한다<br>- 카테고리 구조를 정의한다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="510" y="180" width="210" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-37" value="- 각 application(provider A/B/C)은 <br>&nbsp; 도메인 영역을 기준으로 분리되어 있다<br>&nbsp; (상품 탐색/상품 상세/상품 검색/장바구니 등)<br>- 필요한 데이터는 CMS와 upstream에서 가져오며, 별도 DB를 관리하지 않는다<br>- 기본역할은 데이터를 받아와 UI rendering을 위한 모델을 만드는 것이다<br>- 빠른 AB test를 위해 대부분의 작업은 이 레이어에서 이루어진다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="382" y="535" width="210" height="135" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-45" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.024;entryY=0.386;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-39" target="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-43" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-39" value="web browser" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="710" width="40" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-46" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=-0.035;entryY=0.386;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-42" target="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-44" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-42" value="mobile web browser" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="830" width="40" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-47" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-43" target="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-31" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-43" value="web application" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="710" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-48" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-44" target="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-31" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-44" value="mobile web application" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="830" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-49" value="- upstream에는 데이터를 가지고 있는 다양한 도메인이 존재한다 (주문, 배송, 결제, 상품 추천, 상품 랭킹, 상품 인덱싱, 멤버 세그먼트 프로모션 설정, 상품 쿠폰 설정, 카테고리 설정 등)<br>- 해당 도메인들은 대부분 자체 DB를 운용한다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1170" y="155" width="230" height="135" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-51" value="Order" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1058.5" y="390" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-52" value="Delivery" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1058.5" y="500" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-53" value="Order" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="951.5" y="500" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-54" value="Payment" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="951.5" y="610" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-55" value="- upstream 데이터는 방대하기 때문에<br>이 레이어에서 필요 데이터만 정제한다<br>- 상품 인덱싱 정보등은 카산드라 등에서<br>&nbsp;가져오나 기본적으로 DB는 없다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="730" y="420" width="211" height="135" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-57" value="팀 오너십 영역" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="319" y="291" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-59" value="리소스 부족시 투입될 수 있는 영역" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="126" y="157" width="180" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Jz8gt5AX799GDV3krARJ-60" value="어플리케이션 구성" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="30" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> <diagram id="imWqLZ3NGMRESgbx5QMP" name="CICD 구성"> <mxGraphModel scan" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="270" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-16" id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-17" value="api diff test with prepared dataset" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="410" y="270" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-18" value="api diff test<br>with production data" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="270" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-20" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-19" target="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-23" value="" style="shape=callout;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;perimeter=calloutPerimeter;position2=0;rotation=90;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="717.2" y="212.81" width="326.87" height="611.25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-28" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="850" y="420" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-30" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-24" target="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-29"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-24" value="application" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="380" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-26" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" target="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="660" y="420" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-29" value="kafka" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="850" y="480" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-33" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-31" target="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-29"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-31" value="stable node<br>(master)" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="480" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-34" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-32" target="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-29"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-32" value="test node<br>(new)" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="585" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-36" value="- production application으로 들어온 request중 일정 비율을 kafka로 보낸다<br>- kafka에 쌓인 request정보를 production master와 같은 stable node, 새로운 commit이 포함된 test node로 보낸다<br>- 두 node의 response값을 비교한다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="610" y="660" width="580" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-37" value="normal flow" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="860" y="405" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-38" value="request" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="610" y="405" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-44" value="slack" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="700" y="260" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-46" value="빌드과정에서 발생한 문제는 슬랙으로 통보된다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="790" y="270" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-47" value="- 빌드시 보안검사, 테스트커버리지 검사(jacoco), 기타 코드 문제점 검사(sonar cube), api response 결과 비교 등을 수행한다<br>- 모든 검사를 통과하고 성공적으로 빌드된 이미지는 Jfrog 레포지토리에 업로드 된다<br>- Jfrog에 업로드된 이미지는 프로덕션에 배포하거나 dev환경에 배포할 때 이용된다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="350" width="410" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ar2j0HUcr5Whv7kU8wmd-49" value="- k8s 기반 자체 프레임워크를 사용한다 <br>- 배포는 stage-canary-AZ A-AZ B순으로 진행된다<br>- 배포는 rollout 방식으로 수행된다" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="740" y="140" width="260" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 408px; margin-left: 125px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- 모든 요청/응답은 gateway를 통한다
- 사용자 및 디바이스 정보를 헤더에 넣는다
- 요청에 따라 랜딩할 페이지를 정하고,
Page layout Admin에서 호출할
모듈 목록을 받아와 비동기 호출한다

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 88px; margin-left: 914px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 모든 내부 호출은 API registry에 등록된 api mapping 정보에 의해 이뤄진다

switch.text: 모든 내부 호출은 API registry에 등록된 api mapping 정보에 의해 이뤄진다

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 183px; margin-left: 235px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- 페이지별 레이아웃을 설정한다
(모듈순서, eager/lazy loading 등)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 183px; margin-left: 495px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- 비즈니스팀에서 정의한
프로모션 상품, 배너 등을 저장한다
- 카테고리 구조를 정의한다

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 573px; margin-left: 367px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- 각 application(provider A/B/C)은
도메인 영역을 기준으로 분리되어 있다
(상품 탐색/상품 상세/상품 검색/장바구니 등)
- 필요한 데이터는 CMS와 upstream에서 가져오며, 별도 DB를 관리하지 않는다
- 기본역할은 데이터를 받아와 UI rendering을 위한 모델을 만드는 것이다
- 빠른 AB test를 위해 대부분의 작업은 이 레이어에서 이루어진다

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 747px; margin-left: 53px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 867px; margin-left: 53px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 720px; margin-left: 414px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 840px; margin-left: 414px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 228px; height: 1px; padding-top: 193px; margin-left: 1155px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- upstream에는 데이터를 가지고 있는 다양한 도메인이 존재한다 (주문, 배송, 결제, 상품 추천, 상품 랭킹, 상품 인덱싱, 멤버 세그먼트 프로모션 설정, 상품 쿠폰 설정, 카테고리 설정 등)
- 해당 도메인들은 대부분 자체 DB를 운용한다

switch.text: - upstream에는 데이터를 가지고 있는 다양한 도메인이 존재한다 (주문, 배송, 결제, 상품 추천, 상품 랭킹, 상품 인덱싱, 멤버 세그먼트 프로모션 설정,...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 400px; margin-left: 1043px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 510px; margin-left: 1043px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 510px; margin-left: 936px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 620px; margin-left: 936px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 209px; height: 1px; padding-top: 458px; margin-left: 715px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- upstream 데이터는 방대하기 때문에
이 레이어에서 필요 데이터만 정제한다
- 상품 인덱싱 정보등은 카산드라 등에서
가져오나 기본적으로 DB는 없다

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 276px; margin-left: 303px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 142px; margin-left: 110px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 리소스 부족시 투입될 수 있는 영역

switch.text: 리소스 부족시 투입될 수 있는 영역

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 93px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
